text:
Miley Cyrus surprised a survivor of the Las Vegas shooting with a welcome home message as she returned back to Southern California on Tuesday.

"Hey Katrina, this is Miley. I have heard about you from so many wonderful people. Your name got to me through so many friends, contestants on 'The Voice,'" the pop star said in a video shared by ABC 7's Elex Michaelson (below).

"And they said you were a huge fan and I just wanted to let you know that I am thinking about you all the time, sending all good, healing, peaceful vibes to you and all your family and your friends."

.@MileyCyrus surprises Las Vegas shooting victim Katrina Hannah w a message. Miley saw our past profiles of Katrina, who is just back in CA. pic.twitter.com/rfzva4ntKR — Elex Michaelson (@abc7elex) October 18, 2017
title: Miley Cyrus Sends a Surprise 'Welcome Home' Message to Las Vegas Shooting Survivor
